name: Evolution Swipe
description:
Inspired by 2048 game, we made for you an evolution game. Make your own evolution from a little sea star to more complex organism. Swipe screen to move pieces and connect similar organisms.

Fun to play and with incredible cute graphics, evolve from simple organism to the top of the ladder.

Start as a brave little sea start and get your rank: caveman, knight, ninja, genius or even .... a surprise.

HOW TO PLAY:
- swipe screen up, down. left and right to move the organisms.
- match similar organisms and make evolution happen.
